channel.title: Morris Animal Refuge
channel.description: The Morris Animal Refuge is a 501(c)(3) open admission shelter dedicated to helping the homeless, abandoned and unwanted pets of the Philadelphia region. Founded in 1874 by Elizabeth Morris, we were the first organization dedicated to sheltering and rehoming pets, and continue that legacy today by providing adoptions, a low-cost spay/neuter program, fostering, humane education and more.

item.title: Stackable Mug
item.description: Add some color to your day with the row house stackable mug! Not only is it colorful, but its shape allows for easy stacking and less clutter in your cabinets.

item.title: MAR T-Shirt
item.description: Our row house t-shirt captures the history of America’s first animal refuge, Morris Animal Refuge. Keep history alive and look great doing it with our Row House T-Shirt!

item.title: Look. Love. Adopt. T-Shirt
item.description: Spread an important message with our baseball t-shirt! The modern design looks awesome and supports the animals of Morris Animal Refuge!

item.title: MAR Mug
item.description: Start your morning with Morris Animal Refuge by purchasing this adorable mug! The cat ears and tail are a fun addition to our classic mug.

item.title: Car Magnet
item.description: Have a little fun with this adorable magnet while supporting our animals! This magnet is perfect for your car, fridge, or anywhere you’d like!
